item.description:
(PLEASE NOTE - The organizers in this group are NOT trained leaders or instructors.  The organizers only set the time and place, each person participating in any group trip is responsible for their own safety.  Each participant is responsible for evaluating all relevant conditions for the trip and determining if their skills and equipment are appropriate for those conditions.)

Let's celebrate the first day of summer with an early evening paddle at Whitehall. Please arrive in time to start paddling at 6:15 PM.  When you come to Whitehall, be careful with directions. If you use your GPS for directions you will end up at a random spot on a side road. The boat launch is on Route 135 between Hopkinton and Westborough Town Centers. The large parking lot for the boat launch is next to the intersection of Dale Road and Route 135 in Hopkinton.  Plan to spend about 2 hours on the water.

You may have noticed that most of the paddles I schedule are at Whitehall. I realize this might not be the most convenient spot for some of you, but, it is by far the largest and prettiest place to paddle in this area and there is usually plenty of parking.  Expect to see some paddles scheduled for Tully Lake in Royalston, MA and perhaps and ocean paddle somewhere on Buzzards Bay or Hingham Harbor.
item.name: Paddle at Whitehall After Work
